name: Ext_R5_MedicinalProductDefinition_comprisedOf
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicinalProductDefinition.comprisedOf for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductDefinition.comprisedOf from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Types of medicinal manufactured items and/or devices that this product consists of, such as tablets, capsule, or syringes
element.definition: Types of medicinal manufactured items and/or devices that this product consists of, such as tablets, capsule, or syringes. Used as a direct link when the item's packaging is not being recorded (see also PackagedProductDefinition.package.containedItem.item).
element.comment: `MedicinalProductDefinition.comprisedOf` has no related element in R4B:MedicinalProductDefinition

element.short: Types of medicinal manufactured items and/or devices that this product consists of, such as tablets, capsule, or syringes
element.definition: Types of medicinal manufactured items and/or devices that this product consists of, such as tablets, capsule, or syringes. Used as a direct link when the item's packaging is not being recorded (see also PackagedProductDefinition.package.containedItem.item).
element.comment: `MedicinalProductDefinition.comprisedOf` has no related element in R4B:MedicinalProductDefinition
